fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Copy a random ability from a target at night. They will be notified of this. You may not target members of the Seven. (3 uses)
**Insatiable Avarice** â€” Gain a charge of every single ability used tonight from non-Seven roles. Once you use this, you may no longer multitask. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your visits are Astral.
- You may Multitask, though this does include performing the factional Seven kill.
- When you're visited by any non-Seven role you will copy all of their abilities without their knowledge.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Devolve the town into sin and chaos, eviscerate all who would try to banish you or Satan.
